entry.data:
SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS AROUND 70
